plays.text: Penalty to Jay Bouwmeester 2 minutes for Crosschecking Zach Parise
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Kristian Huselius
Goal scored by Nathan Horton unassisted
Penalty to Olli Jokinen 2 minutes for Hooking Jamie Langenbrunner
Goal scored by Sergei Brylin assisted by Brian Gionta AND Scott Gomez
Penalty to Branislav Mezei 2 minutes for Roughing Jamie Langenbrunner

Goal scored by Viktor Kozlov assisted by Alexander Mogilny AND Brian Rafalski

Goal scored by Juraj Kolnik assisted by Martin Gelinas
Goal scored by Zach Parise assisted by Alexander Mogilny AND Dan McGillis
Penalty to Branislav Mezei 2 minutes for Interference Zach Parise
Penalty to Grant Marshall 2 minutes for Tripping Jozef Stumpel
Penalty to Juraj Kolnik 2 minutes for Boarding Richard Matvichuk
Goal scored by Alexander Mogilny assisted by Jamie Langenbrunner AND Viktor Kozlov
